title: F.T.C. Sues to Block Microsoft’s $69 Billion Acquisition of Activision
description: The move by the commission signals an aggressive stance by federal regulators to thwart the expansion of the tech industry’s biggest companies.

title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Faces Market Manipulation Inquiry
description: Federal prosecutors are investigating whether Sam Bankman-Fried and his hedge fund orchestrated trades in a way that led to the collapse of two cryptocurrencies in May.
